verses.verse: The former <S%G4413><s%> treatise <S%G3056><s%> have I made, <S%G4160><s%> O Theophilus, <S%G2321><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> and teach, <S%G1321><s%>

Until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> he was taken <S%G353><s%> up, after that he through <S%G1223><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> had given commandments <S%G1781><s%> to the apostles <S%G652><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had chosen: <S%G1586><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he showed <S%G3936><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> his passion <S%G3958><s%> by many <S%G4183><s%> infallible proofs, <S%G5039><s%> being seen <S%G3700><s%> of them forty <S%G5062><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and speaking <S%G3004><s%> of the things pertaining <S%G4012><s%> to the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

And, being assembled <S%G4871><s%> together <S%G4817><s%> with them, commanded <S%G3853><s%> them that they should not depart <S%G5562><s%> from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> but wait <S%G4037><s%> for the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> said he, you have heard <S%G191><s%> of me.

For John <S%G2491><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water; <S%G5204><s%> but you shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> hence. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5025><s%>

When they therefore <S%G3767><s%> were come <S%G4905><s%> together, <S%G4905><s%> they asked <S%G1905><s%> of him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> will you at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> restore <S%G600><s%> again <S%G600><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> to Israel? <S%G2474><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, It is not for you to know <S%G1097><s%> the times <S%G5550><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the seasons, <S%G2540><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has put <S%G5087><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> power. <S%G1849><s%>

But you shall receive <S%G2983><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> after that the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> is come <S%G1904><s%> on you: and you shall be witnesses <S%G3144><s%> to me both <S%G5037><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and in Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> and to the uttermost <S%G2078><s%> part of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, while they beheld, <S%G991><s%> he was taken <S%G1869><s%> up; and a cloud <S%G3507><s%> received <S%G5274><s%> him out of their sight. <S%G3788><s%>

And while <S%G5613><s%> they looked <S%G816><s%> steadfastly <S%G816><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> as he went <S%G4198><s%> up, behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> stood <S%G3936><s%> by them in white <S%G3022><s%> apparel; <S%G2066><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> You men <S%G435><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> you gazing <S%G1689><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> heaven? <S%G3772><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> same <S%G3778><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is taken <S%G353><s%> up from you into <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> shall so <S%G3779><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> in like <S%G3779><s%> manner <S%G5158><s%> as you have seen <S%G2300><s%> him go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> they to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> from the mount <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet, <S%G1638><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is from Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> a sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day's journey. <S%G3598><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> they were come <S%G1525><s%> in, they went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> an upper <S%G5253><s%> room, <S%G5253><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> stayed <S%G2650><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> and Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> and Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%> and Matthew, <S%G3156><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> and Simon <S%G4613><s%> Zelotes, <S%G2208><s%> and Judas <S%G2455><s%> the brother of James. <S%G2385><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> continued <S%G4342><s%> with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%> and supplication, <S%G1162><s%> with the women, <S%G1135><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and with his brothers. <S%G80><s%>

And in those <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> (the number <S%G3793><s%> of names <S%G3686><s%> together <S%G1909><s%> were about <S%G5613><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> and twenty, <S%G1501><s%>)

Men <S%G435><s%> and brothers, <S%G80><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> needs have been fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> by the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> spoke <S%G4277><s%> before <S%G4277><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was guide <S%G3595><s%> to them that took <S%G4815><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
For he was numbered <S%G2674><s%> with us, and had obtained <S%G2975><s%> part <S%G2819><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> ministry. <S%G1248><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man purchased <S%G2932><s%> a field <S%G5564><s%> with the reward <S%G3408><s%> of iniquity; <S%G93><s%> and falling <S%G4248><s%> <S%G1096><s%> headlong, <S%G4248><s%> he burst <S%G2997><s%> asunder <S%G2997><s%> in the middle, <S%G3319><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> his bowels <S%G4698><s%> gushed <S%G1632><s%> out.

And it was known <S%G1110><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the dwellers <S%G2730><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%G2419><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> as that field <S%G5564><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> in their proper <S%G2398><s%> tongue, <S%G1258><s%> Aceldama, <S%G184><s%> that is to say, The field <S%G5564><s%> of blood. <S%G129><s%>

For it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of Psalms, <S%G5568><s%> Let his habitation <S%G1886><s%> be desolate, <S%G2048><s%> and let no <S%G3361><s%> man dwell <S%G2730><s%> therein: <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and his position as bishop <S%G1984><s%> let another <S%G2087><s%> take. <S%G2983><s%>

Why <S%G3767><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> men which have companied <S%G4905><s%> with us all <S%G3956><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> <S%G1831><s%> in and out among <S%G1909><s%> us,

Beginning <S%G756><s%> from the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> to that same day <S%G2250><s%> that he was taken <S%G353><s%> up from us, must <S%G1163><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> be ordained <S%G1096><s%> to be a witness <S%G3144><s%> with us of his resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

And they appointed <S%G2476><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Barsabas, <S%G923><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Justus, <S%G2459><s%> and Matthias. <S%G3159><s%>

And they prayed, <S%G4336><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> You, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which know <S%G2589><s%> the hearts <S%G2589><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, show <S%G322><s%> whether <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> you have chosen, <S%G1586><s%>

That he may take <S%G2983><s%> part <S%G2819><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> and apostleship, <S%G651><s%> from which <S%G3739><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> by transgression <S%G3845><s%> fell, that he might go <S%G4198><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>

And they gave <S%G1325><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> their lots; <S%G2819><s%> and the lot <S%G2819><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on Matthias; <S%G3159><s%> and he was numbered <S%G4785><s%> with the eleven <S%G1733><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>
